    boardMenu

    • Uses of GameController in boardMenu

      Constructors in boardMenu with parameters of type GameController 
      Constructor and Description
      BoardMenuCenterPanel(GameController gc, java.awt.Dimension boardMenuSize, java.awt.Dimension buttonPanelSize, java.awt.Dimension sidePanelSize)
      Creates a BoardMenuCenterPanel object to setup the center panel.

    • Uses of GameController in controller

      Constructors in controller with parameters of type GameController 
      Constructor and Description
      TutorialGameController(GameController controller)
      Constructor that creates a TutorialGameController object and initializes the game model and game view to setup the tutorial.

    • Uses of GameController in main

      Constructors in main with parameters of type GameController 
      Constructor and Description
      GameView(GameController gc, TutorialGameController tutorialController)
      Creates a GameView object that initializes each of the controllers that are needed in the game and starts up the main menu view to begin playing the game and selecting an option.
